step1.title: Choose Your Devices

step2.description: Our multilingual AI companion (English, Spanish, Dutch) monitors activity patterns 24/7, provides daily check-ins, and alerts nurses to any concerning changes.

step3.description: When alerts trigger or emergencies occur, our 24/7 nurse-led call center responds immediately. Family dashboards keep everyone informed in real-time.
